description: A simple grammar: sequences of rooted cycles.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 795
formula: E.g.f.: 1/(1-x*log(1/(1-x))).a(n) = (-1)^(n)*n!*sum(k=0..n/2, (k!*stirling1(n-k,k))/(n-k)!). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 16 2011a(n) ~ n! * r^(n+1)/(r+1/(r-1)), where r = 1.349976485401125... is the root of the equation (r-1)*exp(r) = r. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 30 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 16 2016
